title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-13.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-13.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

On and after July first, two thousand fifteen, rates of reimbursement for Prevocational Services (Site based) and Respite (Hourly and Free-standing) and fees for Prevocational Services (Community-based), Residential Habilitation (Family Care) and Supported Employment, other than those provided by the Office for People With Developmental Disabilities, shall be determined in accordance with this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
86-13.1

Adopted
by

New

York State Register April 13, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 15, eff. 4/13/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
